basic.description:
Laboratory course introducing modern experimental methods in chemistry, including synthesis, analytical instrumentation and computational methods. The integration of several methods will be emphasized in the synthesis and characterization of molecules. 
LEARNING HOURS    300 (144Lb;12T:144P)
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Experimental Chemistry

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     12.0 units at the 200 level in CHEM, including CHEM222 and CHEM223.
Corequisite    6.0 units at the 300 level in CHEM.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from CHEM397; CHEM398; CHEM399.
